title: Chris Brown 'banned from Life Time fitness centre' after furious row with management'
text:

Chris Brown has reportedly been banned from Life Time fitness centre after an alleged row with the New York City branch's manager. 
The singer is said to have been handed a lifetime ban from the company's locations after he was accused of having a furious clash with the boss, who was impressed with his behaviour. 
According to TMZ, the star was with his crew "on the basketball courts playing loud music, cussing and hurling insults" when they were allegedly asked to leave, leading to the row. Chris Brown says 'the truth' will come out (Photo: Splash News) 
The star is yet to comment on the row, but simply shared a picture of him on the snowy streets and voiced his love for the city. 
He wrote: "I LOVE NEW YORK!" https://www.instagram.com/p/BO93KPNgYle/embed 
It comes after Chris' row with Soulja Boy went into overdrive as it seems Floyd Mayweather could be training the rapper for a potential boxing fight. 
The two rappers have been caught up in a bitter feud recently, and while Soulja apologised this week, it looks like their rivalry could still be set to go to the next level . 
Sharing a poster and suggesting the bout could go down in Las Vegas this spring, he wrote: "It's going down!
